title: Introduction to British Literature
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in british literature. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Fundamentals of Technical Writing
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in technical writing. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: World Literature
description: Comprehensive study of world literature with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Poetry
description: Interdisciplinary approach to poetry combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Writing
description: Comprehensive study of writing with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Advanced World Literature
description: In-depth analysis of world literature principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Advanced Writing
description: Rigorous treatment of writing theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Special Topics in World Literature
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of world literature. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
prerequisites: ENGL 388 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Rhetoric
description: Rigorous treatment of rhetoric theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: ENGL 341 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Literature
description: Advanced exploration of literature covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: ENGL 335 and senior standing or graduate status
